title: Onboarding Step Schema
description: Schema for onboarding content that guides users through structured instructions, such as introducing a new project.

title.description: The title of the onboarding step or topic.

description.description: A high-level summary of what the onboarding step covers.

instructions.description: Special instructions to use for this onboarding step.

voicing.description: The intended tone, style, or personality of the instruction content.

type.description: The type of content - either onboarding or changelog.
